channel.title: Changing the name of an item
channel.description:
How do i change the name of an item?
i changed it's name in "items.cfg" but that has no effect in the server???

item.title: Changing the name of an item
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

Here it is
In class8 find:

return class8;

above add

Code:

if (class8.aString170 != null) { try { BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new FileReader("itemmasks.dat")); String line = ""; while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) { if (line.startsWith("#")) continue; StringTokenizer tok = new StringTokenizer(line, ":"); String old = tok.nextToken(); if (old.equalsIgnoreCase(class8.aString170)) { class8.aString170 = tok.nextToken(); if (tok.hasMoreTokens()) class8.aByteArray178 = tok.nextToken().getBytes(); } } br.close(); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }then find

Code:

import sign.signlink;replace with

Code:

import sign.signlink; import java.util.*; import java.io.*;

now in your client folder make a file called “itemmasks.dat”
And put this in it:

Dragon dagger:Dragon defender:A Dragon defender

1 = Actual Item name 2 = New name 3 = Examine info
That is a example , just use it
